title: Friends and neighbors = Friends and neighbours
creator_credit: Jack Wipper, Sterling Educational Films, Lori Productions and Edmund Penney
brief_description: Investigates learning to live together, how to treat friends and neighbours, and shows how it is often easy to take advantage of the weak and gullible and to ignore social responsibility. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack Wipper, Sterling Educational Films, Lori Productions and Edmund Penney
